abstract: The consumer products giant has created “Crescent Heights,” a new online soap opera that aims to reach young viewers where they watch most — their PCs and cellphones.
snippet: The consumer products giant has created “Crescent Heights,” a new online soap opera that aims to reach young viewers where they watch most — their PCs and cellphones.
lead_paragraph: Can young Ashley find success and happiness in the big city? Will the dashing Eric win her heart? Can she make consumers buy more Tide detergent?

headline.main: P.&G., the Pioneer of Mixing Soap and Drama, Adds a Web Installment
headline.print_headline: P.&G., the Pioneer of Mixing Soap and Drama, Adds a Web Installment
